page.title: 03St.Briavel's Chicken Farm
page.content: The chicken farm has 11 workers including a manager.They clean the chickens out once a fortnight.A tractor comes and cleans the manure out of the sheds.The chicken farm has got 76,000 chickens.There are 16 small hoppers and 10 big ones which store the grain for the chickens.People have to wear special plastic boots and overalls for protection against disease.In a little room there was a melange machine which separates the shell from the yolk and the white.They use the mix for cakes,because they cannot sell the cracked eggs to the people.They have about 410,000 dozen eggs a week.Collecting lorries can carry 103,680 eggs each.
